page.title: 13CLUBS IN LECHLADE
page.content: { {ADVENTURE.}Cubs, Guides and Brownies do activities like camps, games and sports. {DRAMATIC.}Lechlade Players perform plays like "Dear Octopus." There is a branch for younger performers. {CHARITY.}There are groups like the R.N.L.I., Lions, W.I., M.U. and R.A.O.B.. {CHURCH.}The choir sing psalms, hymns and anthems in the Church. The Compass Club discuss Bible stories and the Discoverers find out more about religion. {SENIOR CITIZENS}meet weekly at the Day Centre and at Silver Threads. {SPORTS.} Clubs exist for football, cricket, tennis, running, keep-fit etc... The school has swimming, gymnastics, athletics and football activities.
